thread.title: Very good premier inn
thread.title_full: Very good premier inn - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: John P
title: Very good premier inn
text:
Excellent 3 night stay at a near new Premier Inn in a great location to make the most of Brixtons vibrant atmosphere, friendly helpful staff good sized room and of course very comfortable bed,it's a short 2 minuet walk from the tube and a good bus service just across the road a pub next door and a good cinema almost opposite along with a choice of every possible ethnic food in restaurants near by make this a good place to stay, and don't worry the sound insulation really works the room was quiet !!
Room Tip: Only stayed once so can't comment See more room tips
